message.entry: This implementation of uitable is no longer supported and will be removed in a future release.
When using UITABLE numrows and numcols have to be numeric scalars.
Number of column names must match number of columns in data
When using UITABLE Column data should be 1xn cell array
numrows has to be a scalar
numcolumns has to be a scalar
gridcolor has to be a valid character vector
rowheight has to be a scalar
parent must be a valid handle
Parent must be a Figure or any UIContainer
position has to be a 1x4 numeric array
columnwidth has to be a scalar
No Data provided along with ColumnNames
This implementation of uitable is no longer supported and will be removed in a future release.\nSee the documentation for correct uitable usage:\n help uitable and doc uitable
''ColumnFormat'' value has no effect when ''Data'' value is a table array.
Can''t create MCOS mxArray
Arguments may only include figure, uicontainer, or uitable handle and param/value pairs
Invalid figure or uitable handle
Number of columns in both Data and ColumnNames should match
getPrintImage must be called on a valid uitable handle
getGUIDEView must be called on a valid uitable handle
Table data is not editable at this location.

When Data is a table array, ColumnEditable can be true only for columns consisting of a single vector with the following data types:\nnumeric, logical, datetime, categorical, string, or cell array of character vectors.
The 'v0' argument for uitable has been removed.
